The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
Mark Twain
In general, mankind, since the improvement of cookery, eats twice as much as nature requires.
Benjamin Franklin
Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
Bethenny Frankel
I don't stop eating when I'm full. The meal isn't over when I'm full. It's over when I hate myself.
Louis C. K.
I followed the same diet for 20 years, eliminating starches, living on salads, lean meat, and small portions.
Gene Tierney
We never repent of having eaten too little.
Thomas Jefferson
Nothing burns more calories than dancing in 5-inch heels... try it!
Ariana Grande
No disease that can be treated by diet should be treated with any other means.
Maimonides
I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
Mae West
My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.
Orson Welles
Every single diet I ever fell off of was because of potatoes and gravy of some sort.
Dolly Parton
Diets, like clothes, should be tailored to you.
Joan Rivers
Don't compare yourself with someone else's version of happy or thin. Accepting yourself burns the most calories.
Caroline Rhea
A systemic cleansing and detox is definitely the way to go after each holiday. It is the key to fighting high blood pressure, heart disease, cancer, and other health-related illnesses.
Lee Haney
A friend doesn't go on a diet because you are fat.
Erma Bombeck
Adopting a new healthier lifestyle can involve changing diet to include more fresh fruit and vegetables as well as increasing levels of exercise.
Linford Christie
The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.
Jackie Gleason
Once you have to start counting calories, it takes away from the joy of eating.
Mireille Guiliano
High-quality food is better for your health.
Michael Pollan
What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease.
Alexander Pope
When we win, I'm so happy I eat a lot. When we lose, I'm so depressed, I eat a lot. When we're rained out, I'm so disappointed I eat a lot.
Tommy Lasorda

This is what people don't understand: obesity is a symptom of poverty. It's not a lifestyle choice where people are just eating and not exercising. It's because kids - and this is the problem with school lunch right now - are getting sugar, fat, empty calories - lots of calories - but no nutrition.
Tom Colicchio
I don't believe in fad diets.
Jenny Craig
Leave the table while you still feel you could eat a little more.
Helena Rubinstein
Want to learn to eat a lot? Here it is: Eat a little. That way, you will be around long enough to eat a lot.
Tony Robbins
I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is two weeks.
Totie Fields
Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.
Giada De Laurentiis
What's the two things they tell you are healthiest to eat? Chicken and fish. You know what you should do? Combine them, eat a penguin.
Dave Attell
I don't eat junk foods and I don't think junk thoughts.
Peace Pilgrim
I never count calories, but I eat so well.
Alicia Silverstone
As for those grapefruit and buttermilk diets, I'll take roast chicken and dumplings.
Hattie McDaniel
Calories from protein affect your brain, your appetite control center, so you are more satiated and satisfied.
Mark Hyman

So, when it comes to eating healthy, it's just doing the right thing. And it's not something you have to do 365 days a year, but I think it's something you have to do 25 days a month. Let's put it that way.
Mike Ditka

My nutritionist has done a great job in changing my diet after we established I am allergic to things like gluten - I can't eat pizza, pasta and bread. I have lost some weight, but my movement is sharper and I feel great.
Novak Djokovic
I have been dairy free for several years, and I started because I felt it was going to reduce my allergies, which it did, and help me lose weight, which it did.
Fran Drescher
The heart, like the stomach, wants a varied diet.
Gustave Flaubert
People have got to learn: if they don't have cookies in the cookie jar, they can't eat cookies.
Suze Orman
I'm lucky, I don't like sweets, not even chocolate.
Eva Herzigova
Cereal eating is almost a marker for a healthy lifestyle. It sets you up for the day, so you don't overeat.
Bruce Barton
If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice.
Salma Hayek
A boxer's diet should be low in fat and high in proteins and sugar. Therefore you should eat plenty of lean meat, milk, leafy vegetables, and fresh fruit and ice cream for sugar.
Gene Tunney
I don't believe in depriving myself of any food or being imprisoned by a diet.
Joely Fisher
I love healthy stuff and junk an equal amount. Whatever I'm craving, I go for it. I'm never trying to lose weight - or gain it. I'm just being.
Kelly Clarkson
I think of dieting, then I eat pizza.
Lara Stone

I've realized that I'm more important than food is. I love a big slice of pizza, but I love myself more. Being thin is about changing the way you think about yourself. It's about saying that you deserve to be healthy.
Valerie Bertinelli
Frankly, I don't trust any diet that doesn't allow sugar.
Bethenny Frankel
You feel better when you're eating food that retains nutritional value.
Amber Heard
I drink Diet Coke from the minute I get up to the minute I go to bed.
Karl Lagerfeld
I thought, you know the food and the diet thing is one way to start yourself onto a healthy lifestyle, but if you don't move, if you don't start exercising you're gonna deteriorate.
Warren Cuccurullo
I feel about airplanes the way I feel about diets. It seems to me that they are wonderful things for other people to go on.
Jean Kerr
I never diet. I smoke. I drink now and then. I never work out.
Naomi Campbell
The dieting wars have got to stop.
Lady Gaga
Some people are willing to pay the price and it's the same with staying healthy or eating healthy. There's some discipline involved. There's some sacrifices.
Mike Ditka
You don't want to make a steady diet of just lettuce. You don't want to make a steady diet of fried chicken.
Paula Deen
The easiest diet is, you know, eat vegetables, eat fresh food. Just a really sensible healthy diet like you read about all the time.
Drew Carey

If I could have a Barbie body, which has no cellulite, I totally would. I would like to have a flatter stomach, but that won't happen either. That is never going to happen. No matter how much weight I lose, my stomach, below the belly button, always pooches out.
Holly Madison
I highly recommend worrying. It is much more effective than dieting.
William Powell
A safe and nutritionally adequate diet is a basic individual right and an essential condition for sustainable development, especially in developing countries.
Gro Harlem Brundtland
It's one thing to lose weight, but it's another thing to eat healthy.
Jennifer Hudson
I used to drink tons of caffeine. Now I make smoothies with frozen berries and Green Vibrance health powder.
Leighton Meester
